transArray.content: It's warm when entering, the security guard is very enthusiastic, the handsome guy at the front desk is very patient, the elevator is very stylish, the robot is very cute, the room is very spacious, the bathroom is very clean, the toilet is very smart, the bed is very tidy, the pillows are very comfortable, the TV is large and clear, wash and dry The separation is very convenient, the air purifier is very comfortable to turn on, the room is very quiet, the curtains are very good at blocking out light, I like the decoration of the room very much, the service staff is very enthusiastic, coffee at the front desk, recommended to everyone, the location is also relatively good, very close to the bus station, easy to travel Very convenient, the price is right, like it.
Dear guest, thank you very much for choosing. Summer has the late glow. Just like the little guy who comes late, everyone is smiling. I love you, little guy.
